card_text: This card gains these effects based on the number of "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames", "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder", and/or "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms" with different names you control.$N●1+: Each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): Gain LP equal to the ATK of that monster(s).$N●2+: Negate the activated effects of monsters your opponent controls.$N●3: Any monsters sent to your opponent's GY are banished instead.$NOnce per your turn, if you control a Level 10 monster: You can add 1 Continuous Trap from your GY to your hand.
